>
[Ongoing Investigation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1459) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 62 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You're always investigating what's around you, even as you perform other activities. You can move at full Speed while using the [Investigate](/Actions.aspx?ID=516) exploration activity, and you can use another exploration activity while Investigating.
